description: APQC Process Classification Framework (PCF) - Cross Industry

1.1.name: Define the business concept and long-term vision

1.1.2.name: Survey market and determine customer needs and wants

1.2.2.2.name: Assess and analyze impact of each option

1.2.3.1.name: Select core competencies for long-term strategy

1.2.4.name: Coordinate and align functional and process strategies

2.0.name: Develop and Manage Products and Services

2.1.2.1.name: Identify potential improvements to existing products

2.2.1.name: Design, build, and evaluate products and services

2.2.3.2.name: Design and obtain materials and equipment

3.0.name: Market and Sell Products and Services

3.1.1.name: Perform customer and market intelligence analysis

3.1.1.2.name: Analyze and draw conclusions from research

4.1.name: Plan for and align supply chain resources

4.1.1.name: Develop production and materials planning strategies

5.1.name: Establish service delivery governance and strategies

5.1.1.name: Establish service delivery strategies and goals

6.1.2.name: Develop customer service policies and procedures

6.2.name: Plan and manage customer service operations

6.2.1.name: Plan and manage customer service workforce

6.3.name: Measure and evaluate customer service operations

7.1.name: Develop and manage HR planning, policies, and strategies

8.2.name: Develop and manage IT customer relationships

8.4.name: Develop and maintain information technology solutions

11.0.name: Manage Enterprise Risk, Compliance, Remediation, and Resiliency

11.3.2.name: Test and maintain business continuity plans

12.3.name: Manage relations with board of directors
